feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.3
entry.content:
To expose the watcher functionality to the user, a new directory /tmp/imports/watched/ was created. Add new volume to the docker-compose.yml file to expose this directory to the host machine.

```diff ...

dawarich_app: image: freikin/dawarich:latest container_name: dawarich_app volumes: - gem_cache:/usr/local/bundle/gems - public:/var/app/public + - watched:/var/app/tmp/imports/watched

...

dawarich_sidekiq: image: freikin/dawarich:latest container_name: dawarich_sidekiq volumes: - gem_cache:/usr/local/bundle/gems - public:/var/app/public + - watched:/var/app/tmp/imports/watched

...

volumes: db_data: gem_cache: shared_data: public: + watched: ```

Changed

  • Watcher now looks into /tmp/imports/watched/USER@EMAIL.TLD directory instead of /tmp/imports/watched/ to allow using arbitrary file names for imports

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Fix/import watcher user directory by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/304

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.2...0.15.3

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.4
entry.content:
Changed

  • Use static version of geocoder library that supports http and https for Photon API host. This is a temporary solution until the change is available in a stable release. Kudos to @chrisl8 ! (https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/issues/300#issuecomment-2414606291)

Added

  • Owntracks' .rec files now can be imported to Dawarich. The import process is the same as for other kinds of files, just select the .rec file and choose "owntracks" as a source.
  • The docker-compose.yml file now contains healthchecks to make application start more robust and predictable. Have a look at https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/327 to find an example of usage.

Removed

  • Owntracks' .json files are no longer supported for import as Owntracks itself does not export to this format anymore.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Bump rswag-specs from 2.14.0 to 2.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/312
  • Bump rswag-ui from 2.14.0 to 2.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/311
  • Bump importmap-rails from 2.0.1 to 2.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/310
  • Bump webmock from 3.23.1 to 3.24.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/309
  • Bump rswag-api from 2.14.0 to 2.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/325
  • Bump importmap-rails from 2.0.2 to 2.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/324
  • Bump tailwindcss-rails from 2.7.6 to 2.7.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/322
  • Adding healthcheck for containers for Docker compose configuration by @tetebueno in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/327
  • FIX: Support importing owntracks rec file by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/328
  • Installation: use docker compose, not docker-compose by @tylerjwoodfin in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/329

New Contributors

  • @tylerjwoodfin made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/329

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.3...0.15.4

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.5
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Fixed a bug where Google Takeout import was failing due to unsupported date format with milliseconds in the file.
  • Fixed a bug that prevented using the Photon API host with http protocol. Now you can use both http and https protocols for the Photon API host. You now need to explicitly provide PHOTON_API_USE_HTTPS to be true or false depending on what protocol you want to use. Example is in the docker-compose.yml file.

Changed

  • The Map page now by default uses timeframe based on last point tracked instead of the today's points. If there are no points, the map will use the today's timeframe.
  • The map on the Map page can no longer be infinitely scrolled horizontally. #299

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Allow different timestamp formats in Google exports to be parsed by @saschazepter in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/281
  • Add use_https option to photon call to fix Issue #333 by @chrisl8 in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/338

New Contributors

  • @saschazepter made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/281
  • @chrisl8 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/338

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.4...0.15.5

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.6
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Import of Owntracks' .rec files now correctly imports points. Previously, the import was failing due to incorrect parsing of the file.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.5...0.15.6

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.7
entry.content:
Fixed

  • A bug where "RuntimeError: failed to get urandom" was being raised upon importing attempt on Synology.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Fix missing urandom by using OpenSSL's random_bytes by @saschazepter in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/280

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.6...0.15.7
